name: Black Jack (itch)
description:
A very primitive Black Jack game that I made for a school project. Instructions are included in the game, just click to get to the main game and then click either the hit or hold button to play, or the new game button to restart. If you are clicking and the button doesn't sense your mouse is on the button, then you just need to move it slightly. HIT ESC TO EXIT.

Features Include:
  • Automatic Card Counting
  • Automatic Betting System
  • An AI adjusted to the perfect difficulty level
  • In Depth Instructions and Background Information

GAME SOURCE IS PUBLIC : https://github.com/tsteinholz/BlackJack
